item.title: Windows 虛擬機軟件 NanaBox 支持 TPM 2.0
item.description:
軟餐獲悉，Windows 虛擬機軟件 NanaBox 最近推出了對 TPM 2.0 的支持。NanaBox 是一款年輕的虛擬化軟件，發佈於 2022 年（GitHub）。最新版的 NanaBox 1.2 Update 2（1.2.797.0）在更新日誌提及了上述改進：「此更新引入了對 Windows Server 2022 或更高版本主機操作系統中的虛擬機的受信任平台模塊（TPM）2.0 支持。」

其同類軟件 VirtualBox、VMware 等更早之前即已支持 TPM 2.0。

Windows virtual machine software NanaBox recently introduced support for TPM 2.0. NanaBox is a young virtualization software, released in 2022. The latest version of NanaBox 1.2 Update 2 (1.2.797.0) mentioned the above improvements in the update log: 「This update introduces support for Trusted Platform Module (TPM) 2.0 for virtual machines on Windows Server 2022 or later host operating systems.」

Similar software such as VirtualBox and VMware have supported TPM 2.0 earlier.

item.title: 蘋果下週發佈獨立的密碼管理器 App
item.description:
軟餐獲悉，彭博社記者馬克·古爾曼（Mark Gurman）稱，蘋果公司將於 6 月 10 日在 WWDC 上推出自己的密碼管理器。它將適用於 iOS 18、iPadOS 18 和 macOS 15。該密碼管理器將被稱為 「Passwords」，可與 iCloud 鑰匙串配合使用。它跟蹤所有設備上的用户密碼，可以在 「設置」 中找到。該應用程序包括登錄列表，並提供分類功能（例如帳户、Wi-Fi 網絡和密鑰），支持自動填充。它還可以在 Vision Pro 頭顯和 Windows 上運行。蘋果希望藉此為用户提供一個清晰的密碼應用程序，以與 1Password 和 LastPass 等密碼管理器競爭。

Apple will introduce its own password manager at WWDC on June 10, according to Bloomberg’s Mark Gurman. It will be available for iOS 18, iPadOS 18, and macOS 13. The password manager will be called 「Passwords」 and will work with the iCloud Keychain. It will keep track of users’ passwords across their devices and will be accessible in the Settings app. The app will feature a list of logins and will have an organizational structure (like accounts, Wi-Fi networks, and secure notes), complete with autofill support. It will also be available on the rumored mixed-reality headset and on Windows. With this move, Apple looks to provide users with a first-party password application to rival password managers like 1Password and LastPass.

item.title: 微軟宣佈重啓 Win10 Beta 通道，將發佈新功能
item.description:
軟餐獲悉，微軟正在重新開放 Windows 10 的 Beta 頻道，並稱將為 Win10 提供 「新功能和更多改進」。微軟將在未來幾周內發佈第一個新的 Beta 版本。此舉令人意外，因為微軟一年前已宣佈 Windows 10 不再獲得任何新功能。通過 Beta 頻道，Windows 10 用户可以繼續留在 Windows 10，而不是升級到 Windows 11。不過，Windows 10 的終止時間不會因為 Beta 頻道的 「復活」 而改變，它將於 2025 年 10 月 14 日退出歷史舞台。

Microsoft is reopening the Beta Channel for Windows 10, saying it will give the software 「new features and further improvements.」 Microsoft will release its first new Beta build in the coming weeks. The move is a surprise, coming a year after Microsoft said that Windows 10 would no longer receive new features. The Beta Channel gives Windows 10 users a way to keep using Windows 10 instead of upgrading to Windows 11 . However, the end-of-support date for Windows 10 won’t change as a result of the Beta Channel’s resurrection: it’s still scheduled to be retired on October 14, 2025.

item.title: Firefox 瀏覽器最新支持「標籤頁預覽」
item.description:
軟餐獲悉，Mozilla 將為 Firefox 瀏覽器推出標籤頁預覽功能。現在 Firefox Nightly 已率先推出該功能，將鼠標懸停在標籤頁上，即可預覽該標籤頁的縮略圖，該功能已默認開啓，無需額外手動設置。

Chrome、Edge 等主流瀏覽器之前已支持標籤頁預覽功能。

Mozilla is rolling out a tab preview feature to its Firefox browser. The feature is currently available in Firefox Nightly, and lets users hover over a tab to see a thumbnail preview of the page. The feature is enabled by default and does not require any manual setup.

Other major browsers, such as Chrome and Edge, already support tab previews.

item.title: Netflix 終止支持第二代和第三代 Apple TV
item.description:
Netflix 宣佈將於 7 月 31 日終止對第二代和第三代 Apple TV 機型的支持。這些設備已有十多年的歷史了，蘋果公司也已很久未對這些型號提供支持。這兩款機型都早於 tvOS 及其 App Store，因此預裝了一系列應用程序。蘋果於 2016 年為第三代 Apple TV 發佈了最後一次更新。Netflix 將繼續支持 2015 款 Apple TV HD 和 Apple TV 4K 機型。去年底，Netflix 也宣佈停止支持多款舊款索尼電視。

Netflix has announced that it will end support for second- and third-generation Apple TV models on July 31. These devices are over a decade old, and Apple has not provided support for them in years. Both models predate tvOS and its App Store, instead featuring a collection of pre-installed apps. Apple released its last update for the third-generation Apple TV in 2016. Netflix will continue to support the 2015 Apple TV HD and Apple TV 4K. Late last year, Netflix also announced that it was dropping support for several older Sony TVs.
